title._content: Image taken from page 74 of 'History and General Description of New France ... translated, with notes, by John Gilmary Shea. [With plates, including a portrait.] F.P'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History and General Description of New France ... translated, with notes, by John Gilmary Shea. [With plates, including a portrait.] F.P" Author: CHARLEVOIX, Pierre François Xavier de. Contributor: SHEA, John Dawson Gilmary. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10470.i.13." Volume: 04 Page: 74 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1866 Publisher: J. G. Shea Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000667140 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
